attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We beleive its not appropriate to walk around streets with ones underwear on show.  We find it offensive.

We also have grave concerns for the health of our youth and expect that if the trend continues that young people who now have to physically hold their trousers round their knees to stop them dropping to the floor will ultimately end up with strange deformaties in years to come.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
